external_references.description: Adam Burgher. (2021, June 10). BackdoorDiplomacy: Upgrading from Quarian to Turian. Retrieved September 1, 2021

description: [BackdoorDiplomacy](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0135) has used web shells to establish an initial foothold and for lateral movement within a victim's system.(Citation: ESET BackdoorDiplomacy Jun 2021)
